entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
